sourcesContent:
import type { Dict } from '../../../../../utils/types';

const GLSL_TO_SIZE: Dict<number> = {
    float:    1,
    vec2:     2,
    vec3:     3,
    vec4:     4,

    int:      1,
    ivec2:    2,
    ivec3:    3,
    ivec4:    4,

    uint:     1,
    uvec2:    2,
    uvec3:    3,
    uvec4:    4,

    bool:     1,
    bvec2:    2,
    bvec3:    3,
    bvec4:    4,

    mat2:     4,
    mat3:     9,
    mat4:     16,

    sampler2D:  1,
};

/**
 * @private
 * @method mapSize
 * @param {string} type
 */
export function mapSize(type: string): number
{
    return GLSL_TO_SIZE[type];
}
